bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & OCLV Carbon seatstay w/alloy chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, magnesium EVO Link, oversized pivot bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, 150mm travel

components.description: DT Swiss XM 1550 Tricon, 24 hole, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub; center lock, tubeless rims (no spoke holes)
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek Frustum SE Light Edition, E2
Trek fork and shock sag meter, ABP Convert hardware for 135x5mm QR, Bontrager shock pump
